response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. Considering its significance and the potential it offers to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a price of $950,000. This represents a remarkable opportunity for you to secure a high-value asset at a premium discount compared to its market value. I trust this proposal aligns well with your interests and financial considerations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
